div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://smart.who.int/ig/smart-immunizations-measles/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D1.DE1 defines the following codes:

tr.td: The immunization event was successfully carried out as intended

Immunization event record has been mistakenly created or entered into system. Recorded information is incorrect or should not have been documented, though it is possible that real-world decisions were based on it
Planned immunization event was not carried out for some reason

definition.value: The immunization event was successfully carried out as intended

Immunization event record has been mistakenly created or entered into system. Recorded information is incorrect or should not have been documented, though it is possible that real-world decisions were based on it
